children.name: Product defects

The following error originated from your application code, not from Cypress.

  > Loading script failed.
(error: http://localhost:3001/static/remoteEntry.js)
while loading "./Content" from 3476

When Cypress detects uncaught errors originating from your application it will automatically fail the current test.

This behavior is configurable, and you can choose to turn this off by listening to the `uncaught:exception` event.

https://on.cypress.io/uncaught-exception-from-application
Check App headers and buttons visability
Check that App 2 Content Block with filled text appear

The following error originated from your application code, not from Cypress. It was caused by an unhandled promise rejection.

  > ReactDOM.createRoot is not a function

When Cypress detects uncaught errors originating from your application it will automatically fail the current test.

This behavior is configurable, and you can choose to turn this off by listening to the `uncaught:exception` event.

https://on.cypress.io/uncaught-exception-from-application
Checks that remote component card appears after loading
Checks both cards includes button
Checks both cards button is not disabled
Checks both cards button shares same color
Checks host app card color is set to blue
Checks remote app card color is set to black
Checks that host card button text includes counter which changed after click & check value reverted after reload
Checks that remote card button text includes counter which changed after click & check value reverted after reload
Checks star symbol visibility for host card
Checks host card includes status
Checks cloud symbol visibility for remote card
Checks remote card includes status
Test defects

`cy.visit()` failed trying to load:

http://localhost:3001/

We attempted to make an http request to this URL but the request failed without a response.

We received this error at the network level:

  > Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:3001

Common situations why this would fail:
  - you don't have internet access
  - you forgot to run / boot your web server
  - your web server isn't accessible
  - you have weird network configuration settings on your computer
Check App elements visability
